lead_paragraph: The battle is threatening to complicate government efforts to attract desperately needed foreign investment, two weeks after the lifting of sanctions.

headline.print_headline: New Iran Battle Brews Over Foreign Oil Titans
headline.main: In Iran, New Battle Brews Over Contracts With Foreign Oil Giants

snippet: The battle is threatening to complicate government efforts to attract desperately needed foreign investment, two weeks after the lifting of sanctions.
abstract: Iran’s leaders appear divided over Iran Petroleum Contract, proposal which will open country's oil industry to foreign investors; Pres Hassan Rouhani says outside investment is necessary to upgrade wells and infrastructure, but opponents fear plan will privatize industry.
